description: bound book with two metal cover plates; black felt covers plates; duct tape label on cover; wood spine; black tulle tape secures front and back cover together; inner pages and cover made of mixed media materials such as rope, waxed canvas and painted metal; text; lender's archive #118
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
title: Das 20. Jarhundert
